00064 const int RADIO = 120;
00065 const double ECLIPTIC = 23.5 *( tgc::Pi/180 );

00067 
00068 CelestialWidget::CelestialWidget( QWidget* parent )
00069 :QWidget( parent ), m_declination( 0 ), m_rightAscension( 0 )
00070 {
00071         Trace( "CelestialWidget::CelestialWidget", false );
00072         
00073         QVBoxLayout* mainLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00074         setLayout( mainLayout );
00075         
00076         QWidget* examinerWidget = new QWidget;
00077         examinerWidget->setFixedSize( 490, 300 );
00078         mainLayout->addWidget(examinerWidget);
00079         
00080         m_rootNode = new SoSeparator;
00081          
00082     m_rootNode->addChild( Ejes() );
00083     m_rootNode->addChild( Sphere(RADIO) );
00084         m_rootNode->addChild( CelestialEquator( RADIO ) );
00085         m_rootNode->addChild( Ecliptic() );
00086         m_rootNode->addChild( Points() );
00087         m_rootNode->addChild( RightAscension() );
00088         m_rootNode->addChild( Declination() );
00089     m_rootNode->addChild( Star() );
00090     
00091         SoQtExaminerViewer* myRenderArea = new SoQtExaminerViewer( examinerWidget );
00092     myRenderArea->setSceneGraph( m_rootNode );
00093     SbColor col( 0.86f, 0.86f, 0.86f );
00094     myRenderArea->setBackgroundColor(col);
00095     myRenderArea->show(  );
00096     
00097     QWidget* labelsWidget = new QWidget;
00098     mainLayout->addWidget( labelsWidget );
00099  
00100         QGridLayout* labelsLayout = new QGridLayout;
00101         labelsWidget->setLayout( labelsLayout );
00102         
00103         QLabel* m_rightLabel = new QLabel;
00104         m_rightLabel->setText( "Right Ascension:" );
00105         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_rightLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1 );
00106         
00107         m_rightValue = new QLabel;
00108         m_rightValue->setText( QString::number( m_rightAscension ) );
00109         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_rightValue, 0, 1, 1, 3  );
00110         
00111         QLabel* m_declinationLabel = new QLabel;
00112         m_declinationLabel->setText( "Declination:" );
00113         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_declinationLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1 );
00114         
00115         m_declinationValue = new QLabel;
00116         m_declinationValue->setText( QString::number( m_declination ) );
00117         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_declinationValue, 1, 1, 1, 3 );
00118 }

00125 void CelestialWidget::CoordinatesChanged( cSunCoordinates coordinates )
00126 {
00127         Trace( "CelestialWidget::CoordinatesChanged", false );
00128         
00129         m_rightAscension = coordinates.dRightAscension;
00130         m_rightValue->setText( QString::number( m_rightAscension ) );
00131         m_declination = coordinates.dDeclination;
00132         m_declinationValue->setText( QString::number( m_declination ) );
00133         
00134         //Right Ascension
00135         SoSeparator* ascension = RightAscension();
00136         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 5, ascension );
00137         
00138         //Declination
00139         SoSeparator* declination = Declination();
00140         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 6, declination );
00141         
00142         //Star
00143         SoSeparator* star = Star();
00144         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 7, star );
00145 }
00146 
00147 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::CelestialEquator( int r ) const
00148 {
00149         Trace( "CelestialWidget::CelestialEquator", false );
00150         
00151         SoSeparator* ecuador = new SoSeparator;
00152         
00153         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00154         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.80f);   // Olive
00155         ecuador->addChild(myMaterial);
00156         
00157         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00158         drawstyle->lineWidth = 2;
00159         ecuador->addChild( drawstyle );
00160         
00161         float p[360][3];
00162         for( int fi = 0; fi<360; fi++ )
00163         {
00164                 p[fi][0] = -sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) )*r ;
00165         p[fi][1] =  0.0;
00166         p[fi][2] = -cos( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) )*r ;
00167                 
00168         }
00169         
00170         int lines[1]={360};
00171         SoCoordinate3 * coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00172         coord3->point.setValues(0, 360, p);
00173         ecuador->addChild(coord3);
00174                 
00175         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00176         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,1,lines);
00177         ecuador->addChild(lineset);     
00178         
00179         return ecuador; 
00180 }
00181 
00182 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Declination()
00183 {
00184         Trace( "CelestialWidget::Declination", false );
00185         
00186         //Decliantion
00187         SoSeparator* declination = new SoSeparator; 
00188 
00189         SoMaterial* declinationMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00190         declinationMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0f, 0.5f, 0.0 );   // Green
00191         declination->addChild( declinationMaterial );
00192         
00193         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00194         drawstyle->lineWidth = 4;
00195         declination->addChild( drawstyle );
00196         
00197         float declinationPoints[360][3];
00198         
00199         for( int theta = 0; theta< 360; theta++ )
00200         {
00201                 double grad = ( m_declination / 360 ) * theta;
00202                 declinationPoints[theta][0] = sin( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad )* RADIO;
00203         declinationPoints[theta][1] = sin( grad ) * RADIO;
00204         declinationPoints[theta][2] = cos( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad ) * RADIO ;
00205         }
00206         
00207         int declinationLines[1] = {360};
00208         SoCoordinate3 * declinationCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00209         declinationCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 360, declinationPoints );
00210         declination->addChild( declinationCoord3 );
00211         
00212         SoLineSet* decliantionLine=new SoLineSet;
00213         decliantionLine->numVertices.setValues( 0, 1, declinationLines );
00214         declination->addChild( decliantionLine );
00215         
00216         
00217         SoSeparator* curve = new SoSeparator;
00218         declination->addChild( curve );
00219         
00220         SoMaterial* curveMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00221         curveMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0, 0.50f, 0.0 );   // Orange
00222         //curveMaterial->transparency.setValue( 0.3f );
00223         curve->addChild( curveMaterial );
00224         
00225         float curvePoints[270][3];
00226         Point3D center( 0, 0, 0 );
00227 
00228         int numPoints = 0;
00229         int indexes[360];
00230         for( int index = 1; index <= 90; index ++ )
00231         {
00232                 curvePoints[numPoints][0]= center.x;
00233                 curvePoints[numPoints][1]= center.y;
00234                 curvePoints[numPoints][2]= center.z;
00235                 indexes[ ( index -1 ) * 4 ] = numPoints;
00236                 numPoints++;
00237                 
00238                 double grad1 = ( m_declination / 360 ) * 4 * ( index -1 );
00239                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad1 )* RADIO;
00240         curvePoints[numPoints][1] =  sin( grad1 ) * RADIO;
00241         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = cos( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad1 ) * RADIO ;
00242         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +1 ] = numPoints;
00243                 numPoints++;
00244                 
00245                 double grad2 = ( m_declination / 360 ) * 4 * index;
00246                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad1 )* RADIO;
00247         curvePoints[numPoints][1] =  sin( grad2 ) * RADIO;
00248         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = cos( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad2 ) * RADIO ;
00249         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +2 ] = numPoints;
00250                 numPoints++;
00251                 
00252                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) + 3 ] = -1;
00253         
00254         }
00255         
00256         
00257         SoCoordinate3 * curveCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00258         curveCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 270, curvePoints );
00259         curve->addChild( curveCoord3 );
00260         
00261         SoIndexedFaceSet* facet = new SoIndexedFaceSet;
00262         facet->coordIndex.setValues( 0, 360, indexes );
00263         curve->addChild( facet );
00264         
00265         return declination;
00266 }
00267 
00268 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Ecliptic() const
00269 {
00270         Trace( "CelestialWidget::Ecliptic", false );
00271         
00272         SoSeparator* ecliptic = new SoSeparator;
00273         
00274         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00275         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.80f, 0.80f, 0.0f);   // Olive
00276         ecliptic->addChild(myMaterial);
00277         
00278         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00279         drawstyle->lineWidth = 2;
00280         ecliptic->addChild( drawstyle );
00281         
00282         float p[360][3];
00283         for( int fi = 0; fi<360; fi++ )
00284         {
00285                 p[fi][0] = cos( ECLIPTIC ) * sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO;
00286         p[fi][1] =  sin( ECLIPTIC ) * sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO;
00287         p[fi][2] = -cos( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO;
00288                 
00289         }
00290         
00291         int lines[1]={360};
00292         SoCoordinate3 * coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00293         coord3->point.setValues(0, 360, p);
00294         ecliptic->addChild(coord3);
00295                 
00296         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00297         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,1,lines);
00298         ecliptic->addChild(lineset);    
00299         
00300         return ecliptic;
00301 }

00303 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Ejes() const
00304 {
00305         Trace( "CelestialWidget::Ejes", false );
00306         
00307         SoSeparator* polos = new SoSeparator;
00308         
00309         SoSeparator* eje = new SoSeparator;
00310         polos->addChild( eje );
00311         
00312         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00313         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);   // Red
00314         eje->addChild(myMaterial);
00315         
00316         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00317         drawstyle->lineWidth = 2;
00318         eje->addChild( drawstyle );
00319         
00320         float p[2][3]={{0.0, -RADIO-40, 0.0}, 
00321                                         {0.0, RADIO+40, 0.0}};
00322 
00323         SoCoordinate3* coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00324         coord3->point.setValues(0, 2, p);
00325         eje->addChild(coord3);
00326         
00327         int lines[1]={2};
00328         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00329         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,1,lines);
00330         eje->addChild(lineset);
00331         
00332         //North celestial pole
00333         SoSeparator* norte = new SoSeparator;
00334         
00335         SoMaterial* norteMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00336         norteMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 );   // Red
00337         norte->addChild( norteMaterial );
00338         
00339         SoTransform* norteTransf = new SoTransform;
00340         norteTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( 0.0, RADIO+30, 0.0 ) );
00341         norte->addChild( norteTransf ); 
00342                 
00343         SoText2* northText= new SoText2();
00344         northText->string.setValue("North celestial pole");
00345         northText->justification = SoText2::CENTER;
00346         norte->addChild( northText );
00347         polos->addChild( norte );
00348         
00349         //South celestial pole
00350         SoSeparator* south = new SoSeparator;
00351         
00352         SoMaterial* southMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00353         southMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 );   // Red
00354         south->addChild( southMaterial );
00355         
00356         SoTransform* southTransf = new SoTransform;
00357         southTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( 0.0, -RADIO-30, 0.0 ) );
00358         south->addChild( southTransf ); 
00359                 
00360         SoText2* southText= new SoText2();
00361         southText->string.setValue("South celestial pole");
00362         southText->justification = SoText2::CENTER;
00363         south->addChild( southText );
00364         polos->addChild( south );
00365         
00366         return polos;
00367 }

00369 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Points() const
00370 {
00371         Trace( "CelestialWidget::Points", false );
00372         
00373         SoSeparator* points = new SoSeparator;
00374         
00375         //Earth
00376         SoSeparator* earth = new SoSeparator;
00377         points->addChild(earth);
00378         
00379         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00380         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.8f, 0.8f, 0.9f);   // Blue
00381         earth->addChild(myMaterial);
00382         
00383         SoSphere* earthSphere=new SoSphere;
00384         earthSphere->radius=5;
00385         earth->addChild(earthSphere);
00386         
00387         //AriesPoint
00388         SoSeparator* aries = new SoSeparator;
00389         points->addChild(aries);
00390         
00391         SoSeparator* ariesPoint = new SoSeparator;
00392         aries->addChild(ariesPoint);
00393         
00394         SoMaterial* ariesMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00395         ariesMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.9f);   // Blue
00396         ariesPoint->addChild(ariesMaterial);
00397         
00398         SoTranslation* ariesTransform = new SoTranslation;
00399         ariesTransform->translation.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, RADIO );
00400         ariesPoint->addChild( ariesTransform);
00401         
00402         SoSphere* ariesSphere=new SoSphere;
00403         ariesSphere->radius=5;
00404         ariesPoint->addChild(ariesSphere);
00405         
00406         SoSeparator* ariesText = new SoSeparator;
00407         aries->addChild( ariesText );
00408         
00409         SoMaterial* ariesTextMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00410         ariesTextMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 );   // Red
00411         ariesText->addChild( ariesTextMaterial );
00412         
00413         SoTransform* ariesTextTransf = new SoTransform;
00414         ariesTextTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( 0.0, 0.0, RADIO+30 ) );
00415         ariesText->addChild( ariesTextTransf ); 
00416                 
00417         SoText2* textNode= new SoText2();
00418         textNode->string.setValue("Aries");
00419         textNode->justification = SoText2::CENTER;
00420         ariesText->addChild(textNode);
00421         
00422         //Libra Point
00423         SoSeparator* libra = new SoSeparator;
00424         points->addChild(libra);
00425         
00426         SoSeparator* libraPoint = new SoSeparator;
00427         libra->addChild(libraPoint);
00428         
00429         SoMaterial* libraMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00430         libraMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.9f);   // Blue
00431         libraPoint->addChild(libraMaterial);
00432         
00433         SoTranslation* libraTransform = new SoTranslation;
00434         libraTransform->translation.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, -RADIO );
00435         libraPoint->addChild( libraTransform);
00436         
00437         SoSphere* libraSphere=new SoSphere;
00438         libraSphere->radius=5;
00439         libraPoint->addChild(libraSphere);
00440         
00441         SoSeparator* libraText = new SoSeparator;
00442         libra->addChild( libraText );
00443         
00444         SoMaterial* libraTextMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00445         libraTextMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 );   // Red
00446         libraText->addChild( libraTextMaterial );
00447         
00448         SoTransform* libraTextTransf = new SoTransform;
00449         libraTextTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( 0.0, 0.0, -RADIO-30 ) );
00450         libraText->addChild( libraTextTransf ); 
00451                 
00452         SoText2* text= new SoText2();
00453         text->string.setValue("Libra");
00454         text->justification = SoText2::CENTER;
00455         libraText->addChild(text);
00456         
00457         return points;
00458 }

00461 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::RightAscension()
00462 {
00463         Trace( "CelestialWidget::RightAscension", false );
00464         
00465         //Right Ascension
00466         SoSeparator* ascension = new SoSeparator; 
00467         
00468         SoSeparator* right = new SoSeparator; 
00469         ascension->addChild( right );
00470         
00471         SoMaterial* ascensionMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00472         ascensionMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0, 0.50f, 0.0 );   // Orange
00473         right->addChild( ascensionMaterial );
00474         
00475         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00476         drawstyle->lineWidth = 3;
00477         right->addChild( drawstyle );
00478         
00479         
00480         float ascensionPoints[360][3];
00481         for( int fi = 0; fi < 360; fi++ )
00482         {
00483                 double grad = ( m_rightAscension / 360 ) * fi;
00484                 ascensionPoints[fi][0] = sin( grad )* RADIO ;
00485         ascensionPoints[fi][1] =  0.0;
00486         ascensionPoints[fi][2] = cos( grad ) * RADIO ;
00487                 
00488         }
00489         
00490         int ascensionLines[1] = {360};
00491         SoCoordinate3 * ascensionCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00492         ascensionCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 360, ascensionPoints );
00493         right->addChild( ascensionCoord3 );
00494                 
00495         SoLineSet* ascensionLine=new SoLineSet;
00496         ascensionLine->numVertices.setValues( 0, 1, ascensionLines );
00497         right->addChild( ascensionLine );
00498         
00499         SoSeparator* curve = new SoSeparator;
00500                 
00501         SoMaterial* curveMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00502         curveMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0, 0.50f, 0.0 );   // Orange
00503         curve->addChild( curveMaterial );
00504         
00505         float curvePoints[270][3];
00506         Point3D center( 0, 0, 0 );
00507 
00508         int numPoints = 0;
00509         int indexes[360];
00510         for( int index = 1; index <= 90; index ++ )
00511         {
00512                 curvePoints[numPoints][0]= center.x;
00513                 curvePoints[numPoints][1]= center.y;
00514                 curvePoints[numPoints][2]= center.z;
00515                 indexes[ ( index -1 ) * 4 ] = numPoints;
00516                 numPoints++;
00517                 
00518                 double grad1 = ( m_rightAscension / 360 ) * 4 * ( index -1 );
00519                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad1 )* RADIO ;
00520         curvePoints[numPoints][1] =  0.0;
00521         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = cos( grad1 ) * RADIO ;
00522         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +1 ] = numPoints;
00523                 numPoints++;
00524                 
00525                 double grad2 = ( m_rightAscension / 360 ) * 4 * index;
00526                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad2 )* RADIO ;
00527         curvePoints[numPoints][1] =  0.0;
00528         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = cos( grad2 ) * RADIO ;
00529         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +2 ] = numPoints;
00530                 numPoints++;
00531                 
00532                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) + 3 ] = -1;
00533         }
00534         
00535         SoCoordinate3 * curveCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00536         curveCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 270, curvePoints );
00537         curve->addChild( curveCoord3 );
00538         
00539         SoIndexedFaceSet* facet = new SoIndexedFaceSet;
00540         facet->coordIndex.setValues( 0, 360, indexes );
00541         curve->addChild( facet );
00542         
00543         ascension->addChild( curve );
00544         return ascension;
00545 }
00546 
00547 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Sphere( int r ) const
00548 {
00549         Trace( "CelestialWidget::Sphere", false );
00550         
00551         SoSeparator* sph = new SoSeparator;
00552   
00553         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00554         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );   // Blue
00555         myMaterial->transparency.setValue( 0.3f );
00556         sph->addChild( myMaterial );
00557         
00558         SoComplexity* complexity = new SoComplexity;
00559         complexity->value = 0.5;
00560         sph->addChild( complexity );
00561         
00562         SoSphere* sphere=new SoSphere;
00563         sphere->radius=r;
00564         sph->addChild(sphere);
00565 
00566         return sph;
00567 }
00568 
00569 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Star() 
00570 {               
00571         Trace( "CelestialWidget::Star", false );
00572         
00573         //Star definition
00574         SoSeparator* star = new SoSeparator;
00575         
00576         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00577         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 1.0, 0.0);   // yellow
00578         star->addChild(myMaterial);
00579   
00580         SoTranslation* starTransform = new SoTranslation;
00581         starTransform->translation.setValue( cos( m_declination )* sin( m_rightAscension ) * RADIO, sin( m_declination ) * RADIO, cos( m_declination )* cos( m_rightAscension)  * RADIO ) ;
00582         star->addChild( starTransform);
00583         
00584         SoSphere* starSphere=new SoSphere;
00585         starSphere->radius=10;
00586         star->addChild(starSphere);
00587         
00588         return star; 
00589 }
